questions.question: Which is the best description of Anne Frank's hiding place?

choices.answer: A deserted farmhouse in the countryside
The attic of an office building in a big city
The basement of a mansion in the suburbs
The home of a Christian family in a small town

questions.question: What type of writing is Anne Frank famous for?

choices.answer: Philosophy
Autobiography
Fiction
Fantasy

questions.question: Besides hiding, how else did some Jewish people cope with the Nazis during World War II?

choices.answer: By joining the Nazi Party and asking for its protection
By asking their leaders to outlaw Jewish discrimination
By staging marches, boycotts and peaceful demonstrations
By fleeing to North and South America

questions.question: Place the events in order: A) Nazis discover the annex, B)  Diary is published, C) WWII ends

choices.answer: ACB
CAB
BCA
ABC

questions.question: In the sentence, "Anonymous informants told Nazis about Anne Frank". What does anonymous mean?

choices.answer: A Dutch citizen who was also a member of the Nazi Party
Someone who is prejudiced against Jews, but not publically
Someone who reveals information without giving his name
A Nazi soldier whose name and rank were kept secret

questions.question: Which of these is an opinion about Anne Frank?

choices.answer: She did not live to see the end of WWII
Her diary is 1 of the best selling books of the 20th century
She occasionally fought with her sister, Margot
Her writing is more poignant that most adult authors
Large factories that produced war equipment
Place where the Nazis sent Jews and others to be killed
Hiding place where many Jews stayed during the Holocaust
Neighborhoods in big cities where Nazis forced Jews to Live

questions.question: What can you infer by the fact that the Franks were helped by Christian friends?

choices.answer: The Nazis had no power over Dutch citizens
People from different backgrounds opposed the Nazis beliefs
Nazis discriminated against Christians and Jews
Many Jews were hidden in churches

questions.question: If Anne Frank lived in the Netherlands, why was she oppressed by Nazi Germany?

choices.answer: The Dutch people had elected a Nazi government
The Dutch asked the Nazis to oppress their Jewish population
Anne Frank was born in Germany and was subject to its laws
Nazi Germany conquered the Netherlands during WWII

questions.question: What has Anne Frank come to symbolize?

choices.answer: The strength of the human spirit when confronted by evil
The idea that many people can live comfort in a small space
The idea that girls are good at writing in their diaries
The ide that young people can write bestselling books
